name: The TOWNSHIP OF PERKIOMEN, The Board of Supervisors of Perkiomen Township, Claire S. Olson, Richard Kratz, David N. Myers, and John Steele, four of the five Supervisors of Perkiomen Township, Petitioners, v. C. Roy MEST, Lawrence T. Zimmerman, Shane T. Clark and William Patterson, Jr.

parties: The TOWNSHIP OF PERKIOMEN, The Board of Supervisors of Perkiomen Township, Claire S. Olson, Richard Kratz, David N. Myers, and John Steele, four of the five Supervisors of Perkiomen Township, Petitioners, v. C. Roy MEST, Lawrence T. Zimmerman, Shane T. Clark and William Patterson, Jr.

opinions.text: Petition for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, No. 81 E.D. Appeal Docket 1986.

casebody.head_matter:
510 A.2d 721
The TOWNSHIP OF PERKIOMEN, The Board of Supervisors of Perkiomen Township, Claire S. Olson, Richard Kratz, David N. Myers, and John Steele, four of the five Supervisors of Perkiomen Township, Petitioners, v. C. Roy MEST, Lawrence T. Zimmerman, Shane T. Clark and William Patterson, Jr.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 20, 1986.
